WSUS32 KKCI 041855 
SIGC

VALID UNTIL 2055Z 
MO AR 
FROM 20WNW IRK-20S UIN-20SSE ARG-50WSW ARG-30ESE BUM-20WNW IRK 
AREA SEV TS MOV FROM 26040KT. TOPS ABV FL450.
